channel.title: Music – 아이엠(I.M)
channel.description: Recent content in 아이엠(I.M) on Music

item.title: 아이엠(I.M) - Blame
item.description:
What is it that you really wanna say
I cannot get this over
Smoking all the pain to feel you deeply again
Hope I never get sober

Every moment when I breathe
I feel you deep inside of me
Why’re you tryna leave
There’s nothing more that I need

You know that I’m loyal
Gave everything to you
지난날들이 모여
지금 앞이 안 보여

스쳐 지나가듯이 하지 마 별거 아닌 듯이
날 담은 눈은 이미 투명해 전부 잊은 듯이

깊게 나를 차지하는 널
이제 꺼내려 해봐도 replay
It’s hard to forget your big shade my lover
깊게 너를 차지하는 건
이젠 내가 아니어도 keep waiting
Or maybe just blaming

What is it that you really wanna say
I cannot get this over
Smoking all the pain to feel you deeply again
Hope I never get sober

Every moment when I breathe
I feel you deep inside of me
Why’re you tryna leave
There’s nothing more that I need

What is it that you really wanna say
I cannot get this over
Smoking all the pain to feel you deeply again
Hope I never get sober

Every moment when I breathe
I feel you deep inside of me
Why’re you tryna leave
There’s nothing more that I need

Can I be wylin’ when I’m waiting
Cuz I feel drowning when I’m waiting
You’re my reason why I blame on your name
Do you even feel my pain what you made?

Don’t leave me alone my love
I don’t have my own and you know
You’re my all, my home but gone
Don’t leave me alone my love

item.title: 아이엠(I.M) - Dumb
item.description:
Are you dumb dumb dumb
Baby you’re so numb
We’ve been talkin’ love but you never know
Am I naughty? Oh don’t you worry
Baby hurry, you’ll know you got me

Are you dumb dumb dumb
Baby you’re so numb
We’ve been talkin’ love but you never know
Am I naughty? Oh don’t you worry
Baby hurry, you’ll know you got me

You hit me at night
Calling me twice for advice yeh yeh
Am I your device
Cannot suffice all the time yeh yeh
지겹거든 이젠 나도 정말
미련하게 또 반복할 걸 알아

Baby 절대 모를 리가 없는 걸 알아
You know how I feel come look into my eyes
지겹거든 이젠 나도 정말
미련하게 또 반복할 걸 알아

Are you dumb dumb dumb
Baby you’re so numb
We’ve been talkin’ love but you never know
Am I naughty? Oh don’t you worry
Baby hurry, you’ll know you got me

Are you dumb dumb dumb
Baby you’re so numb
We’ve been talkin’ love but you never know
Am I naughty? Oh don’t you worry
Baby hurry, you’ll know you got me

애매한 대답하지 말고 바로 말해
가끔 내가 이해 못 했나 싶기도 해
희망적인 네 말에 하루를 살기도 해
배려 섞인 말보단 네 진심을 원해

So, love me right love me right baby
I am not just a guy to deny baby
Don’t hit me at night for somebody
Hit me at night for my body

I don’t mind if you don’t like me later
I just want you right now
Would you hurry, losing my mind
Can’t come down, I just want you right now

Are you dumb dumb dumb
Baby you’re so numb
We’ve been talkin’ love but you never know
Am I naughty? Oh don’t you worry
Baby hurry, you’ll know you got me

Are you dumb dumb dumb
Baby you’re so numb
We’ve been talkin’ love but you never know
Am I naughty? Oh don’t you worry
Baby hurry, you’ll know you got me

item.title: 아이엠(I.M) - Habit
item.description:
Why don’t you understand
that I’m always like this
Should I just wait and stay?
You know that I’m in pain
Minute became a day
Was it hi, was it bye, all the kiss was just a lie

Monday morning 내 시작은 뻔해
아침은 그저 조금 온도만 다를 뿐
밤처럼 어두운 일상에 너를 더해
Oh can’t say goodbye
cuz you’re my habit and my loop

이젠 그때의 너의 모진 말도
내게 스쳐 지날 듯해도
하나를 못 놔줘 이것조차 너라서
I know that I might be stupid
but I can’t fix myself and you know this
찰나의 시간도 내 습관은 너라서

I cannot love myself cuz you’re my habit to me
I cannot love myself cuz you’re my habit to me
I cannot love myself cuz you’re my habit to me

무던한 내 하루 속
어느새 널 그리는 습관이 아직 낯설어
무덤덤한 듯해도 침묵이 되려 날 어지럽혀

The time we shined I’m still on that time
I should lie to myself ‘I’m fine’
But If I’m still walking to your shadow baby
Take me to daydream

You’re bad but love you so bad
You’re a fad, I know you are passing fad
I’m running at my loop

Teach me how to stop this routine
But you’re my habit to me
Maybe I was just a fad

I cannot love myself cuz you’re my habit to me
I cannot love myself cuz you’re my habit to me
I cannot love myself cuz you’re my habit to me

item.title: 아이엠(I.M) - More
item.description:
Open the door,
I know you just wanna take me on the floor
Come forward,
I feel you cannot hold yourself anymore
Move back n forth,
forget all the nights you got me before
You’re driving me crazy,
can’t stop myself gimme more

아무리 다른 얘기를 더 꺼내 봐도
관심이 없는 듯한 너의 얼굴도
이미 우린 알잖아 out of control
We should keep in on the low low
Just like before

Baby I can’t take it slow
다 알고 싶어 안 보이는 네 작은 점까지
Tell me that you want me more
문을 닫고 우린 말해 talkin’ over body body

I don’t really care bout your gossip
Cuz I can’t stop this yeh addicted
너를 발음하는 혀는 wavy
Think I drank too much of this liquid

네게 가진 그 많은 의문은 잠시
미뤄 두기로 해 잠시
Maybe cuz I like what I see
This is more than a lovesick

Taking off my clothes at the first
And the thirst just comes in a rush
I won’t make you hush but tell me if it hurts
I’m lost in our lust and we should call this love
You know I’m drowning so deep in you
Don’t hesitate to look the truth

Baby I can’t take it slow
다 알고 싶어 안 보이는 네 작은 점까지
Tell me that you want me more
문을 닫고 우린 말해 talkin’ over body body

item.title: 아이엠(I.M) - Not Sorry
item.description:
잔이 바닥을 보일 때쯤
I should talk to you honestly
내 빈속은 더 마셔도 채워지지 않네
I don’t know but I won’t be back to your side
그 어떤 말도 난 남아 있지 않네

Sick of hiding all my thoughts
Even when you cry, I don’t mind
길었던 밤도 지나갈 테니
애써 붙잡지 말자

I’m sorry
미안하지 않아 sorry for not sorry
잊기 힘든 밤 지나면 다시 morning
날 흘러가듯 그저 보내면 돼 away, far away

메말라버린 감정 속엔 나도 없어서
네가 서 있을 곳은 없어
적막함 속에 소리 내어 외쳐도 난 없어
네게 대답을 줄 수가 없어

Let’s let the night so cold
Even if it’s gold cuz I don’t want it anymore
빛나던 날들도 이젠 다
Burn it burn it burn it burn it

I’m sorry
미안하지 않아 sorry for not sorry
잊기 힘든 밤 지나면 다시 morning
날 흘러가듯 그저 보내면 돼 away, far away

item.title: 아이엠(I.M) - OVERDRIVE
item.description:
Deep down on my body, I feel alive
Heat my engine harder till I die
Speedin’ on my lane, go overdrive yeh

Deep down on my body, I feel alive
Heat my engine harder till I die
Speedin’ on my lane, go overdrive yeh

Forget yesterday, I’m runnin’ on my lane yeh
I ain’t nothin to pay,
something I gotta chase yeh
It ain’t for display or for the surface yeh
Even your touché

All I want is new, even if I’m turning blue
지금이 아니면 절대 안 되는 이 기분
이 모든 건 지나가는 한순간일 뿐
Hit me harder cuz I make myself overused

100 bags full of racks no need for my next
허기진 내 머리엔 큰 충격이 필요해
뒤로해 side effects
Ride ride ride ride ride ride ride ride
I’m runnin’ on my lane yeh

Askin’ all the time,
I don’t know what’s in ma mind yeh
급하지 않음 다음에 얘기해 cuz I’m movin’
말해봐도 넌 이해 못하는 나의 vision
I don’t want to miss it, open up and listen

I heard they were chirping on my back huh
내 두 눈은 앞을 향하기에
Sorry to my friend ain’t time for that yeh
내겐 달릴 시간도 부족해

I ain’t pop champagne till I make it rain
I cannot contain what’s in my brain
I drive me insane and do this again
Forget yesterday, I’m runnin’ on my lane

Deep down on my body, I feel alive
Heat my engine harder till I die
Speedin’ on my lane, go overdrive yeh

Deep down on my body, I feel alive
Heat my engine harder till I die
Speedin’ on my lane, go overdrive yeh
